createSignalDetectionWithCurrentPhase.description: Create new signal detection with current phase
createSignalDetectionWithCurrentPhase.helpText: Create new signal detection with current phase on the clicked channel/station.

createSignalDetectionWithDefaultPhase.description: Create new signal detection with default phase
createSignalDetectionWithDefaultPhase.helpText: Create new signal detection with default phase on the clicked channel/station.

createSignalDetectionNotAssociatedWithWa.description: Create new signal detection with current phase & no waveform
createSignalDetectionNotAssociatedWithWa.helpText: Create new signal detection with current phase & no waveform on the clicked channel/station.

createSignalDetectionNotAssociatedWithWa.description: Create new signal detection with default phase & no waveform
createSignalDetectionNotAssociatedWithWa.helpText: Create new signal detection with default phase & no waveform on the clicked channel/station.

viewQcSegmentDetails.helpText: View details about existing QC segments.

showEventDetails.helpText: Show additional details about the event.

showSignalDetectionDetails.helpText: Show additional details about the signal detection.

showStationDetails.helpText: Show additional details about the station or site.

selectParentChild.helpText: Select a channel and its children.

selectParentChildRange.helpText: Alt + click a station label to select a range of channels and their children.

associateSelectedSignalDetections.description: Associate selected signal detections to open event
associateSelectedSignalDetections.helpText: If they are not associated to the currently open event, double click to associate selected signal detection(s) to the currently open event.

unassociateSelectedSignalDetections.description: Unassociate selected signal detections from open event
unassociateSelectedSignalDetections.helpText: If they are associated to the currently open event, double click to unassociate selected signal detection(s) from the open event.

zoomToRange.helpText: Zoom in on a selection by clicking and dragging (with a modifier key).

drawMeasureWindow.helpText: Select a region on a channel to view it in the measure window.

scaleWaveformAmplitude.helpText: Click and drag (with modifier key) to increase/decrease the scale of the y axis, which makes waveforms smaller/larger.

createQcSegments.helpText: Create new QC segments on selected raw channels.

showRuler.helpText: Click and drag to show a popup that measures times in the Waveform Display.

zoomMouseWheel.helpText: Zoom in and out using the mouse wheel.

zoomInOneStep.helpText: Zoom in by a percentage. Zooming in and then out one step returns you to the same view.

zoomOutOneStep.helpText: Zoom out by a configured percentage. Zooming out and then in one step returns you to the same view.

pageDown.helpText: Scroll down in the waveform display so that the bottom-most row is at the top.

pageUp.helpText: Scroll up in the waveform display so that the top-most row is at the bottom.

zoomOutFully.helpText: Zoom out to the open interval.

zas.helpText: Zoom to configured range, align on predicted P, sort by distance. Add stations with signal detections associated to the current open event.

createEventBeam.helpText: Create event beams with default settings for all selected stations or all loaded stations if none are selected

panRight.helpText: Scroll the Waveform Display to the right one step. This will not load additional data outside of the current bounds.

panLeft.helpText: Scroll the Waveform Display to the left one step. This will not load additional data outside of the current bounds.

panRightHard.helpText: Load additional data outside of the current interval (past lead/lag).

panLeftHard.helpText: Load additional data outside of the current interval (past lead/lag).

scaleAllWaveformAmplitude.description: Scale all amplitudes to selected channel
scaleAllWaveformAmplitude.helpText: Scale all waveform amplitudes to match the selected channel. If no channel is selected, this has no effect.

resetSelectedWaveformAmplitudeScaling.description: Reset selected waveform manual amplitude scaling (Y values)
resetSelectedWaveformAmplitudeScaling.helpText: Reset manual amplitude scaling for selected channels. This has no effect on non-selected channels.

resetAllWaveformAmplitudeScaling.description: Reset all waveform amplitude scaling (Y values)
resetAllWaveformAmplitudeScaling.helpText: Reset amplitude scaling for all waveforms.

toggleUncertainty.helpText: Toggle on and off the uncertainty bars for signal detections.

editSignalDetectionUncertainty.helpText: Enable edit signal detection time uncertainty capability on waveform display.

toggleQcMaskVisibility.helpText: Toggle on and off the visibility of the QC masks.

toggleAlignment.helpText: Switch between time alignment and predicted/observed phase alignment. Use the dropdown menu from the Waveform Display toolbar for more options.

workflowRightOneDay.helpText: Scroll the Workflow Display forward in time by one day.

workflowLeftOneDay.helpText: Scroll the Workflow Display back in time by one day.

workflowRightOneWeek.helpText: Scroll the Workflow Display forward in time by one week.

workflowLeftOneWeek.helpText: Scroll the Workflow Display back in time by one week.

showKeyboardShortcuts.helpText: Show the list of keyboard shortcuts (this list).

toggleSetPhaseMenu.helpText: Open set phase menu to change the phase label for selected Signal Detections.

toggleCommandPalette.helpText: Open a popup tool for typing commands.

selectNextFilter.helpText: Select the next filter in the hotkey cycle (indicated by stars in the filter list).

selectPreviousFilter.helpText: Select the previous filter in the hotkey cycle (indicated by stars in the filter list).

selectUnfiltered.helpText: Select the "unfiltered" option in the hotkey cycle. This removes the filtering from any selected channels in the waveform display, or from all channels if nothing is selected.

createNewEvent.helpText: Create event with selected signal detections or virtual event using no signal detections.

associateSelectedSignalDetections.description: Associate selected signal detections to open event
associateSelectedSignalDetections.helpText: Associate selected signal detection(s) to the currently open event.

unassociateSelectedSignalDetections.description: Unassociate selected signal detections from open event
unassociateSelectedSignalDetections.helpText: Unassociate selected signal detection(s) from the currently open event.

currentPhaseLabel.description: Set selected signal detections phase label to current phase
currentPhaseLabel.helpText: Set phase label for selected signal detection(s) to the current phase.

defaultPhaseLabel.description: Set selected signal detections phase label to default phase
defaultPhaseLabel.helpText: Set phase label for selected signal detection(s) to the default phase.

historyEventMode.description: Toggle event mode for history undo/redo
historyEventMode.helpText: Toggle event mode for history undo/redo.

eventUndo.helpText: Undo previous event action for the open event.

eventRedo.helpText: Redo previous undone event action for the open event.

toggleCurrentPhaseMenu.helpText: Open the current phase popup menu to change the current phase label.

increaseVisibleWaveforms.helpText: Increase the number of visible waveforms by one.

decreaseVisibleWaveforms.helpText: Decrease the number of visible waveforms by one.

closeCreateSignalDetectionOverlay.description: Close the create signal detection overlay
closeCreateSignalDetectionOverlay.helpText: Close the currently open signal detection creation overlay.

chromeMenu.description: Prevent browser alt+e menu as it conflicts with alt+e+click
chromeMenu.helpText: Prevent browser alt+e menu as it conflicts with alt+e+click.

beamforming.createEventBeamsDescription:
Creates beams of the current phase for all selected stations that do not have a signal detection for that phase.

If no stations are selected, applies to all loaded array stations.

If a single station is selected and the minimum number of that station's compatible raw channels are selected, those channels will be used as the inputs for a beam on that station.

Beams start at the time of the predicted phase, minus the configured lead time.
Minimum number of compatible raw channels:
